mapper.delete: DELETE gr.*,gra.* FROM gateway_route gr LEFT JOIN gateway_route_args gra ON gr.route_id = gra.route_id where gr.route_id = #{routeId}
mapper.select: select gr.route_id , gr.ordered , gr.uri , gra.`name` ,gra.args from gateway_route gr left join gateway_route_args gra on gr.route_id = gra.route_id
